question: Display newspapers and magazines with a circulation of 20,000.
sql_query1:
SELECT Newspapers.name
FROM Newspapers
WHERE Newspapers.Circulation_Numbers = 20000
UNION
SELECT Magazines.name
FROM Magazines
WHERE Magazines.Circulation_Numbers = 20000
sql_query2:
SELECT Newspapers.name
FROM Newspapers
UNION
SELECT Magazines.name
FROM Magazines
WHERE Magazines.Circulation_Numbers = 20000
interpretation1: What newspapers and magazines have a circulation of 20,000?
interpretation2: List all newspapers and also display magazines with a circulation of 20,000.
